snippet: Some of Retha Walden Gambaro’s sculptures are on view through May 13 in an exhibition at the Heard Museum’s new sculpture garden in Phoenix.
abstract: Heard Museum in Phoenix, Arizona, offers retrospective of sculptures by Retha Walden Gambaro, artist who began honing her craft at age 52.
lead_paragraph: Some of Retha Walden Gambaro’s sculptures are on view through May 13 in an exhibition at the Heard Museum’s new sculpture garden in Phoenix.

headline.seo: Retha Walden Gambaro’s Sculptures at Heard Museum
headline.main: After Promoting Others’ Work, a Late-Blooming Sculptor Realizes Her Dream
headline.print_headline: After Promoting Others’ Work, a Late-Blooming Sculptor Realizes Her Dream
